---
title: Huge URLs
date: 2007-10-29T10:04:00+00:00
excerpt: "I know a few people who use tinyurl to produce more friendly URLs for e-mails and blogs, but I'm glad that someone has"
layout: post
categories:

tags:
  - websites
---
I know a few people who use [tinyurl](http://tinyurl.com/) to produce more friendly URLs for e-mails and blogs, but I&#8217;m glad that someone has now come out with [huge URLs](http://hugeurl.com/). &#8216;Cause, man, huge URLs look so much more important:
